name: Silver Spoon
address: 207-12 Hollis Ave, Queens Village, NY 11429, USA

reviews.text: Great food portions nice

To the Owner/Manager,

I spend a lot of money at this establishment, but every time I come in, the two younger employees at the front always a attitude. Unfortunately, their behavior is consistently unpleasant and makes the shopping experience uncomfortable.

On the other hand, the older woman who works here is always professional, pleasant, and respectful. She represents your business very well.

If this continues, you risk losing loyal customers like myself, as many people will not want to return to a place where they feel disrespected. I hope you take this matter seriously and address the attitudes of the younger employees before it affects your business further.
Quick service, reggae music, amazing food and drinks.

I ordered through delivery, order was delivered early which was great. However the food was awful. I ordered Jerk chicken meal and stew peas meal. The chicken was tasteless with a sweet flavor no jerk heat at allüò°Mac n cheese was dry and lacked proper amount of cheese just a blob of pasta üò°the cabbage had absolutely no season just bland cabbage. This was my first and last order.
A friend told the about the cow foot soup and man it didn't disappoint it was 100 percent good
They warm and friendly..
Great restaurant great staff clean great quality

I ordered chicken soup.  I saw a review on here that said make sure they give you chicken.  I almost forgot to ask and when I did she assured me they had.  Turns out it st a thick broth and veggies.  Cost me $10.00 and some change.  I'm never going back and I wouldn't reccommend. Ill
The food is pretty good, I can't complain I come to Sliver Spoon althea time. The worker are some friendly young ladies. You can also come get breakfast..
Friendly staff good food great service.
This place makes me remeber my younger days forever a place in my heart good food and great service
The food is good but some times it is too salty .
Great food and service. If you don't reserve some dishes, you won't get any.

Worst restaurant ever, as I ordered my food online and they canceled it several times because they did not have what I asked for and the sizes on the menu is not what it seems, cause you will get a mini meal if you order a small and you will get a small if you order a medium. Very unprofessional and it will put a bad taste in your mouth.
Love they oxtails.
Staff very attentive and had great suggestions.

They need to make more breakfast, you have to rush there to get it before it runs out, by 9:30am. At least make enough for the people until 11:00, everyone clearly loves their breakfast but it‚Äôs never enough.  I overheard women on line complaining about this, as well as my mom.
This restaurant has been here for over 25 years. Great food. Owner is such a pleasant person.
The red velvet cake is to die for. I buy it everytime with a side of something else they have available.
Great please. I really love the fried dumplings and fried salt fishü§ó
The food is excellent
The fried dumpling and the saltfish and the porridge wow deelishis

Sooo I just paid 19.xx for underdone oaxtails and no veggies because they didn't have any. Everything is hard as a rock. The carrots, butter beans and meat wasn't even edible. If I didn't live so far away I would bring it back. No way they‚Ä¶
This is a good restaurant,  food and SERVICES  and conditions  clean and good.   I drive miles  to get there,its the best.
Decent Jamaican food and juices. Clean interior
Great place clean friendly staff.
What a great experience. The staff was so nice and respectful such a pleasure. The food  was absolutely amazing full of flavor. I will definitely return for more.
Food was dry, i felt like i wasnt welcomed either.
Great food
There food is ok
Got some good chicken soup. Make sure they give you enuff chicken.mines was light on chicken heavy on flavor

This is hands down one of the top 3 best restaurants in queens. They have the best porridge ever. There food is always good no matter what time of day u order. There staff is very nice and professional. never a long wait.
There food is real home cooked Jamaican food. There personally my favorite

I personally like Jamaica flavors which has several locations. The chicken here seems to be low quality. Sorry its just okay with so much better competition.
I have eaten at many Jamaican restaurants in Queens and Brooklyn and this one is‚Ä¶
Do not ever by the goat soup smells disgusting it also have goat hair in it. No seasoning didn't wash the meat good. And they have nasty attitude, never going back there.

I pretty much came here every week when i worked around the area. I was introduced to the spot on a whim, i was hungry and it was convenient. Upon walking in i was greeted by the Chef. He was really friendly and recommended the fried king‚Ä¶

I've been to other jamaican restaurants and honestly all they have is the name. At Silver Spoon I literally think that they went to the country side of Jamaica and search for the real ram goat. The fried dumplings, the saltfish, the‚Ä¶
Their food is consistently good the owners and staff are very friendly. I have been going there for a few years and get take out at least 3-4 times a month.
Very clean and welcoming environment. The food is excellent and taste great. I purchased the curried goat and also an oxtail.
Been eating here for years. They cater my events and porridge inna di mawnin can neva eva fail. The service is really good too.

Went to buy food, it was my second time there, I don't know if the staff was overwhelmed, tired or both, but she intentionally slowed down looking at the other and myself in a condescending manner. I left and went to another restaurant.
I love they home style cooking. Every time I‚Äôm in Queens I must have their food
The food is good, staff is pleasant and the establishment is always clean.
The whole menu is great but the saltfish is the best I've had yet!
I went and got the jerk chicken , it was not cooked fully . Not only that , it had fur and was not even hot . Literally never seen that from a resturant in my life . Never again!
Amazing food! Fast service! I eat lunch from there almost everyday.
I give the fry dumpling and salt fish high ratings love it my Saturday morning ritual
Love the curry goat, bbq chicken, rice and peas, fried dumplings.... You know what, EVERYTHINGüòéüòÅ‚Ä¶
Great food and friendly staff.. Highly recommend..
Food is well proportioned and always delicious. Lines move quickly.
Love the food here, very delicious
